system.requirements: Void-Master, RT Rank 4+, Pilot (Flyers and Space Craft) +10 and Command Skills
system.descriptionText: A Void-Master has progressed their experience with void craft such as to know their every function and pilot them as extensions of themselves. Effortlessly guiding younger pilots and dominating air and space.
system.effects:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Flight Marshal
Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Best of the Best
